languages.text: Став новым лидером Миссии Касбаллики, Октавиана приложила все усилия, чтобы не отправиться вслед за Владаймом. Руководство Миссии требовало прибыли, блюстители Чорда алкали крови. Дилемма Октавианы разрешилась в день, когда всех хладных торговцев Футфола арестовали, согнали в "Адептус Амасекус" и отшвартовали его от станции. Корабль без топлива и с малым запасом воздуха отправился дрейфовать в сторону звезды Фурибундус. Октавианы на нем не было — заключив сделку и сдав всех подельников, она исчезла с накопленными тронами.

When Octaviana became the new leader of the Kasballica Mission, she made every effort to not end up like Vladaym. The Mission's leadership demanded profits, and Chorda's enforcers thirsted for blood. Octaviana's dilemma sorted itself out when one day all of Footfall's Cold Traders were arrested and herded onto the Adeptus Amasecus. The ship was undocked from the station and left to drift toward Furibundus with no fuel and almost no air. Octaviana was not on board. She had made a deal to turn over all her accomplices, and she disappeared with a fortune in thrones.
languages.original_text: Став новым лидером Миссии Касбаллики, Октавиана приложила все усилия, чтобы не отправиться вслед за Владаймом. Руководство Миссии требовало прибыли, блюстители Чорда алкали крови. Дилемма Октавианы разрешилась в день, когда всех хладных торговцев Футфола арестовали, согнали в "Адептус Амасекус" и отшвартовали его от станции. Корабль без топлива и с малым запасом воздуха отправился дрейфовать в сторону звезды Фурибундус. Октавианы на нем не было — заключив сделку и сдав всех подельников, она исчезла с накопленными тронами.

traits.locale_text: When Octaviana became the new leader of Kasballica Mission, she put all her effort into trying to not end up like Vladaym. Mission leadership demanded profits, and Chorda's enforcers thirsted for blood. Octaviana's trouble sorted itself out when, one day, all Footfall's cold traders got arrested and herded into Adeptus Amasecus. The ship was undocked from the station and started drifting towards the star with no fuel and almost no air. Octaviana was not on board. As she made a deal and turned in all her accomplices, she disappeared with amassed thrones.

As she made a deal and turned in all her accomplices, she disappeared with amassed thrones.

Octaviana's dilemma sorted itself out when one day all of Footfall's cold traders were arrested and herded onto the Adeptus Amasecus. The ship was undocked from the station and left to drift toward Furibundus with no fuel and almost no air. Octaviana was not on board. She had made a deal, turning in all her accomplices and disappearing with a wealth of thrones.

languages.text: 奥克塔维娜成为了卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团的新任领导人。她尽一切努力，确保自己不会落得像弗拉迪姆一样的下场。犯罪集团的领导层要求利润，而库尔达的执法者渴望鲜血，奥克塔维娜始终被夹在两难的境地之中。后来，她的困境得到了解决——落脚港上的所有冷市商人都在同一天遭到逮捕，所有人被赶进了艾玛赛克烈酒修会。随后，那艘飞船离开了星站，没有携带任何燃料，内部也几乎没有任何空气，仅仅是以缓慢的速度朝怒焰星飘去。不过，奥克塔维娜并不在那艘船上，她和库尔达做了笔交易，供出了她所有同伙，之后带着一大堆王座币消失了。
languages.original_text: When Octaviana became the new leader of the Kasballica Mission, she made every effort to not end up like Vladaym. The Mission's leadership demanded profits, and Chorda's enforcers thirsted for blood. Octaviana's dilemma sorted itself out when one day all of Footfall's Cold Traders were arrested and herded onto the Adeptus Amasecus. The ship was undocked from the station and left to drift toward Furibundus with no fuel and almost no air. Octaviana was not on board. She had made a deal to turn over all her accomplices, and she disappeared with a fortune in thrones.

traits.locale_text: 奥克塔维娜成为了卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团的新任领导人。她尽一切努力，确保自己不会落得像弗拉迪姆一样的下场。犯罪集团的领导层要求利润，而库尔达的执法者渴望鲜血，奥克塔维娜始终被夹在两难的境地之中。后来，她的困境得到了解决——落脚港上的所有冷市商人都在同一天遭到逮捕，所有人被赶进了艾玛赛克烈酒修会。随后，那艘飞船离开了星站，没有携带任何燃料，内部也几乎没有任何空气，仅仅是以缓慢的速度朝怒焰星飘去。不过，奥克塔维娜并不在那艘船上，她和库尔达做了笔交易，供出了她所有同伙，之后带着一大堆王座币消失了。

languages.text: Als Octaviana zur neuen Anführerin der Kasballica-Mission wurde, unternahm sie jede Anstrengung, nicht wie Vladaym zu enden. Die Missionsführung verlangte Profite, und Chordas Enforcers gierten nach Blut. Octavianas Dilemma löste sich von allein, als eines Tages alle Kalthändler auf Footfall verhaftet und zum Adeptus Amasecus getrieben wurden. Das Schiff wurde von der Station abgedockt, um ohne Treibstoff und fast ohne Sauerstoff Richtung Furibundus zu treiben. Octaviana war nicht an Bord. Sie hatte einen Handel abgeschlossen und all ihre Komplizen verraten, während sie selbst mit reichlich Thronmünzen im Gepäck verschwand.
languages.original_text: When Octaviana became the new leader of the Kasballica Mission, she made every effort to not end up like Vladaym. The Mission's leadership demanded profits, and Chorda's enforcers thirsted for blood. Octaviana's dilemma sorted itself out when one day all of Footfall's Cold Traders were arrested and herded onto the Adeptus Amasecus. The ship was undocked from the station and left to drift toward Furibundus with no fuel and almost no air. Octaviana was not on board. She had made a deal to turn over all her accomplices, and she disappeared with a fortune in thrones.

traits.locale_text: Als Octaviana zur neuen Anführerin der Kasballica-Mission wurde, unternahm sie jede Anstrengung, nicht wie Vladaym zu enden. Die Missionsführung verlangte Profite, und Chordas Enforcers gierten nach Blut. Octavianas Dilemma löste sich von allein, als eines Tages alle Kalthändler auf Footfall verhaftet und zum Adeptus Amasecus getrieben wurden. Das Schiff wurde von der Station abgedockt, um ohne Treibstoff und fast ohne Sauerstoff Richtung Furibundus zu treiben. Octaviana war nicht an Bord. Sie hatte einen Handel abgeschlossen und all ihre Komplizen verraten, während sie selbst mit reichlich Thronmünzen im Gepäck verschwand.

languages.text: Lorsqu'Octaviana prit la tête de la Mission de la Kasballica, elle fit tout son possible pour ne pas finir comme Vladaym, mais alors que les dirigeants de la Mission exigeaient des profits, les prévôts de Chorda avaient soif de sang. Le dilemme d'Octaviana fut bientôt résolu : un jour, tous les adeptes du Commerce Froid de Castel furent arrêtés et chargés à bord de l'Adeptus Amasecus. Le vaisseau fut ensuite libéré de ses amarres et se mit à dériver en direction de Furibundus, sans carburant ni réserves d'air. Octaviana ne se trouvait pas à bord. Elle avait passé un accord et dénoncé tous ses complices avant de disparaître avec une somme rondelette.
languages.original_text: When Octaviana became the new leader of the Kasballica Mission, she made every effort to not end up like Vladaym. The Mission's leadership demanded profits, and Chorda's enforcers thirsted for blood. Octaviana's dilemma sorted itself out when one day all of Footfall's Cold Traders were arrested and herded onto the Adeptus Amasecus. The ship was undocked from the station and left to drift toward Furibundus with no fuel and almost no air. Octaviana was not on board. She had made a deal to turn over all her accomplices, and she disappeared with a fortune in thrones.

traits.locale_text: Lorsqu'Octaviana prit la tête de la Mission de la Kasballica, elle fit tout son possible pour ne pas finir comme Vladaym, mais alors que les autorités de la Mission exigeaient d'importants profits, les prévôts de Chorda avaient soif de sang. Le dilemme d'Octaviana fut bientôt résolu : un jour, tous les adeptes du Commerce Froid de Castel furent arrêtés et chargés à bord de l'Adeptus Amasecus. Le vaisseau fut ensuite désamarré et se mit à dériver en direction de Furibundus, sans carburant ni réserves d’air. Octaviana ne se trouvait pas à bord. Elle avait passé un accord et dénoncé tous ses complices avant de disparaître avec une somme rondelette.

languages.text: Cuando Octaviana se convirtió en la nueva líder de la misión Kasballica, se esforzó mucho para no acabar como Vladaym. El liderazgo de la misión exigía beneficios, y los agentes de Chorda estaban sedientos de sangre. El dilema de Octaviana se solucionó por sí solo cuando, un día, todos los Comerciantes Fríos de Paso fueron arrestados y enviados al Adeptus Amasecus. La nave abandonó la estación para vagar a la deriva sin combustible ni apenas oxígeno. Octaviana no iba a bordo. Hizo un trato para entregar a todos sus cómplices y desapareció con una fortuna.
languages.original_text: When Octaviana became the new leader of the Kasballica Mission, she made every effort to not end up like Vladaym. The Mission's leadership demanded profits, and Chorda's enforcers thirsted for blood. Octaviana's dilemma sorted itself out when one day all of Footfall's Cold Traders were arrested and herded onto the Adeptus Amasecus. The ship was undocked from the station and left to drift toward Furibundus with no fuel and almost no air. Octaviana was not on board. She had made a deal to turn over all her accomplices, and she disappeared with a fortune in thrones.

traits.locale_text: Cuando Octaviana se convirtió en la nueva líder de la misión Kasballica, se esforzó mucho para no acabar como Vladaym. El liderazgo de la misión exigía beneficios, y los agentes de Chorda estaban sedientos de sangre. El dilema de Octaviana se solucionó por sí solo cuando, un día, todos los Comerciantes Fríos de Paso fueron arrestados y enviados al Adeptus Amasecus. La nave abandonó la estación para vagar a la deriva sin combustible ni apenas oxígeno. Octaviana no iba a bordo. Hizo un trato para entregar a todos sus cómplices y desapareció con una fortuna.

languages.text: オクタヴィアナがカスバリカ聖務団の新しいリーダーとなったとき、彼女はヴラダイムと同じ轍を踏まないよう最大限の努力をした。聖務団のリーダーは利益を求め、チョーダのエンフォーサーは血を求めていた。オクタヴィアナのジレンマは、ある日、フットフォールの闇商人が全員逮捕され、アデプトゥス・アマセックに押し込められたことで解決した。船はステーションからドッキングを解かれ、燃料も空気もほとんどない状態でフリブンダスに向かって漂流することになった。オクタヴィアナは乗船していなかった。彼女は共犯者全員を引き渡すという取引をして、王座の財産とともに姿を消したのだ。
languages.original_text: When Octaviana became the new leader of the Kasballica Mission, she made every effort to not end up like Vladaym. The Mission's leadership demanded profits, and Chorda's enforcers thirsted for blood. Octaviana's dilemma sorted itself out when one day all of Footfall's Cold Traders were arrested and herded onto the Adeptus Amasecus. The ship was undocked from the station and left to drift toward Furibundus with no fuel and almost no air. Octaviana was not on board. She had made a deal to turn over all her accomplices, and she disappeared with a fortune in thrones.

traits.locale_text: オクタヴィアナがカスバリカ聖務団の新しいリーダーとなったとき、彼女はヴラダイムと同じ轍を踏まないよう最大限の努力をした。聖務団のリーダーは利益を求め、チョーダのエンフォーサーは血を求めていた。オクタヴィアナのジレンマは、ある日、フットフォールの闇商人が全員逮捕され、アデプトゥス・アマセックに押し込められたことで解決した。船はステーションからドッキングを解かれ、燃料も空気もほとんどない状態でフリブンダスに向かって漂流することになった。オクタヴィアナは乗船していなかった。彼女は共犯者全員を引き渡すという取引をして、王座の財産とともに姿を消したのだ。

languages.text: Kasballica Misyonu'nun yeni lideri olan Octaviana, sonunun Vladaym gibi olmaması için elinden geleni yaptı. Misyon'un önde gelenleri kâr, Chorda'nın infazcıları ise kan talep etti. Octaviana'nın içinde kaldığı ikilem, Binliman'ın Soğuk Tacirlerinin tutuklanıp Adeptus Amasekus'a doluşturulduğu gün kendiliğinden çözüldü. Gemi, istasyondan ayrılıp yakıtsız ve neredeyse havasız hâlde Furibundus'a doğru sürüklenir vaziyette terk edildi. Octaviana gemide değildi... Tüm suç ortaklarını ispiyonladığı bir anlaşma yapmış, gelt zengini olarak ortadan kaybolmakla meşguldü.
languages.original_text: When Octaviana became the new leader of the Kasballica Mission, she made every effort to not end up like Vladaym. The Mission's leadership demanded profits, and Chorda's enforcers thirsted for blood. Octaviana's dilemma sorted itself out when one day all of Footfall's Cold Traders were arrested and herded onto the Adeptus Amasecus. The ship was undocked from the station and left to drift toward Furibundus with no fuel and almost no air. Octaviana was not on board. She had made a deal to turn over all her accomplices, and she disappeared with a fortune in thrones.

traits.locale_text: Octaviana, Kasballica Misyonu'nun yeni lideri hâline geldikten sonra, sonunun Vladaym gibi olmaması için elinden geleni yaptı. Misyon'un önde gelenleri kâr elde etmeyi, Chorda'nın infazcıları ise kan talep etti. Octaviana'nın içinde kaldığı ikilem, Binliman'ın Soğuk Tacirlerinin tutuklanıp Adeptus Amasekus'a doluşturulduğu gün kendi kendine çözüldü. Gemi, istasyondan ayrıldı ve yakıtsız ve neredeyse havasız bir şekilde Furibundus'a doğru sürüklenir hâlde terk edildi. Octaviana gemide değildi. Tüm suç ortaklarını ispiyonlaması için bir anlaşma yaptı ve gelt zengini olarak ortadan kayboldu.
